column1: last_trial_notice_txt~You just use up your last trial.
hero_defense_rule~Heroes are in danger trying to protect a base from an army of demons. No time to build towers
column2: they must use their strength to stop the enemy.\n\nIn this mode
column3:
you can control up to 5 heroes.

You can only control heroes and cannot build towers.

The goal is to defend an alliance base. When the base is destroyed
column4:
the game is over. Bases will help you level up your heroes right in the middle of a battle. Unlock new bases to equip heroes with passive skills.

You can use gold to upgrade the Hero's stats right in the battle. Tap to the Base on the map to upgrade.

You will receive rewards according to each achievement milestone. Defend as long as you can to get more valuable rewards.

Maps and leaderboards will be refreshed every season. Be prepared to face new challenges.

column1: buff_des_7002~Increases {0} armor and {1} magic resistance for all heroes
buff_des_7003~Increases {0}% damage of active skill of spells
buff_des_7004~Decreases {0}% of cooldown for all heroes
buff_des_7005~Increases {0} critical damage for all heroes
buff_des_7006~Increases {0} max HP for all heroes
defensive_point_skill_8001~An important base that need to be protected at all cost.
defensive_point_skill_8004~Recovers 5 HP per 6 seconds for all heroes

column2: the hero has the ability to strike a thunderbolt that deals 3 damage. Thunderbolt bounces up to 4 other enemies. Damage for each bounce will decrease by 5%.

column1: defensive_point_des_8001~This ancient fortress was built by humans and is still being solid against the attacks of the evil army.
defensive_point_des_8004~A mysterious goddess worshiped by the inhabitants of nature. They believe that the goddess has the ability to heal and bless the warriors of the jungle.

defensive_point_des_8005~This magical tower is where many great magicians reside and learn magic. The magicians infused their power into the tower so that it could help the defenders control the thunder.
join_tournament_txt~Join the Tournament to be honored
change_price_alert_txt~Price will increase every time you change
ban_alert_txt~Your hero is equipping a banned Spell. Do you want to change the Spell?
congratulation_notice_txt~You have reached rank {0} in this season. Let's claim your reward
tournament_rule_map~All players compete on the same endless level.
tournament_rule_limit~Every day players get {0} free plays. If the number of free plays is exhausted
column2: the player needs to use Gems or watch ads to get more. The number of plays will be refreshed every day.

column1: tournament_rule_grand~This is the place to honor the highest records of all time. Keep trying every season to be honored here!
tournament_rule_season~Each Season lasts for 2 weeks. The highest record that players get in each Season will be counted to rank in Hall of Fame.
tournament_rule_buff~If your formation has 2 buffed Heroes
column2: one of their stats will be enhanced. You can use Crystal
column3: Gem and watch ads to randomly change the 2 selected Heroes and their enhanced stat.

column1: tournament_rule_nerf~If you use a weakened hero in your formation
column2: one of their stats will be reduced. That hero will also not appear in the buffed hero pair.

column1: tournament_rule_ban~You will not be able to use tower and banned spell. The ban list will be changed after each season.
